languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, у нас тут... компания". {n}Голос Равора звучит натянуто.{/n} "Целый выводок ксеносов... только вот не торопятся нападать — прислали вокс-передачу, сейчас тут умники наши пытаются расшифровать, что они там плетут на своем..."

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, у нас тут... компания". {n}Голос Равора звучит натянуто.{/n} "Целый выводок ксеносов... только вот не торопятся нападать — прислали вокс-передачу, сейчас тут умники наши пытаются расшифровать, что они там плетут на своем..."

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, у нас тут... компания". {n}Голос Равора звучит натянуто.{/n} "Целый выводок ксеносов... только вот не торопятся нападать — прислали вокс-передачу, сейчас тут умники наши пытаются расшифровать, что они там плетут на своем..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A while brood of xenos... except they are in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our smart folks are trying to decipher what they are babbling in their own language..."

"Lord Captain, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A while brood of xenos... except they are in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our smart folks are trying to decipher what they are babbling in their own language..."

"Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

"Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

"Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, wir haben ... Gesellschaft." {n}Ravors Stimme klingt angespannt.{/n} "Eine ganze Rotte von Xenos ... nur machen sie keine Anstalten, uns anzugreifen. Sie haben eine Vox-Übertragung geschickt, unsere Eierköpfe versuchen also gerade zu entschlüsseln, was sie in ihrer Sprache faseln ..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, wir haben ... Gesellschaft." {n}Ravors Stimme klingt angespannt.{/n} "Eine ganze Rotte von Xenos ... nur machen sie keine Anstalten, uns anzugreifen. Sie haben eine Vox-Übertragung geschickt, unsere Eierköpfe versuchen also gerade zu entschlüsseln, was sie in ihrer Sprache faseln ..."

languages.text: “船长老大，我们……遭遇了其他舰船。”{n}雷沃的声音听起来很紧张。{/n}“是一群异形……但他们并不急于进攻。他们发来了一则音阵讯息，我们的书呆子正打算弄清楚他们在用他们的语言叨咕什么……”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，我们……遭遇了其他舰船。”{n}雷沃的声音听起来很紧张。{/n}“是一群异形……但他们并不急于进攻。他们发来了一则音阵讯息，我们的书呆子正打算弄清楚他们在用他们的语言叨咕什么……”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine} ! Nous avons... de la compagnie. » {n}Ravor semble tendu.{/n} « Tout un tas de xénos... Mais ils n'attaquent pas. Ils ont envoyé une transmission vox, et nos grosses têtes essaient de comprendre ce qu'ils baragouinent... »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine} ! Nous avons... de la compagnie. » {n}Ravor semble tendu.{/n} « Tout un tas de xénos... Mais ils n'attaquent pas. Ils ont envoyé une transmission vox, et nos grosses têtes essaient de comprendre ce qu'ils baragouinent... »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, tenemos... compañía». {n}La tensión de la voz de Ravor es palpable.{/n} «Un montón de xenos... pero no nos están atacando. Han enviado una transmisión de vocos, y ahora los empollones están intentando descifrar sus balbuceos...».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, tenemos... compañía». {n}La tensión de la voz de Ravor es palpable.{/n} «Un montón de xenos... pero no nos están atacando. Han enviado una transmisión de vocos, y ahora los empollones están intentando descifrar sus balbuceos...».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、敵が…やってきます」{n}ラヴォアの緊迫した声が聞こえる。{/n}「異種族の個体群が…しかし攻撃しようというわけではないようです。ヴォクス通信がきています。彼らの言語で何を言っているのかを、専門家が解析しているところです…」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、敵が…やってきます」{n}ラヴォアの緊迫した声が聞こえる。{/n}「異種族の個体群が…しかし攻撃しようというわけではないようです。ヴォクス通信がきています。彼らの言語で何を言っているのかを、専門家が解析しているところです…」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, ziyaretçilerimiz var." {n}Ravor'un sesi gergin geliyor.{/n} "Koca bir zeno sürüsü. Hemen saldırıya geçmediler ama. Bir voks iletisi gönderdiler. Bu dil işlerinden anlayan personelimiz, mesajlarında ne saçmaladıklarını çözmeye çalışıyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we've got... company." {n}Ravor's voice sounds strained.{/n} "A whole brood of xenos... except they're in no hurry to attack. They sent a vox-transmission, so our eggheads are trying to decipher what they're babbling in their language..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, ziyaretçilerimiz var." {n}Ravor'un sesi gergin geliyor.{/n} "Koca bir zeno sürüsü. Hemen saldırıya geçmediler ama. Bir voks iletisi gönderdiler. Bu dil işlerinden anlayan personelimiz, mesajlarında ne saçmaladıklarını çözmeye çalışıyor."
